## FluidStoreState type

Type of [FluidStore](./lib-base.fluidstore.md)<!-- -->'s [state](./lib-base.fluidstore.state.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FluidStoreState<T = unknown> = FluidStoreBaseState & FluidStoreDerivedState & T;
```
<b>References:</b> [FluidStoreBaseState](./lib-base.fluidstorebasestate.md)<!-- -->, [FluidStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.fluidstorederivedstate.md)

## Remarks

It combines all properties of [FluidStoreBaseState](./lib-base.fluidstorebasestate.md) and [FluidStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.fluidstorederivedstate.md) with optional extra state added by the particular `FluidStore` implementation.

The type parameter `T` may be used to type the extra state.
